definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: How are assessments marked and managed?
sentences.chinese: 测评是如何评分与管理的？

sentences.english: Applications of computer in comprehensive appraisal and job assignment of college students are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了计算机在学生综合测评及毕业分配中的应用。

sentences.english: To this end it is necessary to establish grass-roots party organizations in the Democratic leadership team evaluation system.
sentences.chinese: 为此，必须建立基层党组织领导班子民主测评制度。

sentences.english: Finally, the thesis made an empirical research taking Shenzhen OCT as an example.
sentences.chinese: 最后，以深圳华侨城为例对测评体系进行验证。

sentences.english: Assess the adequacy of the performance measurement system, achievement of corporate objective.
sentences.chinese: 评估业绩测评系统的充分性和公司目标的实现情况。

sentences.english: Reframing the argument around achievement wouldn’t end partisan division.
sentences.chinese: 重新在能力测评框架下的争论不会结束党派分歧。

sentences.english: As yet there are no agreed-upon test and evaluation procedures for PHEVs.
sentences.chinese: 现在仍没有对PHEV的一致测评步骤。

sentences.english: Moral assessment is difficult to carry out in the process of selecting the Party and Government cadres in China.
sentences.chinese: 品德测评是我国党政干部选拔中的难点问题。

sentences.english: It can provid quantitative evaluation with marks for each teachers working quality. The results can be used in the evaluation of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 它能够定量地反映每个教师教学质量的实际测评分值。

sentences.english: The traditional paper evaluation system is not fair to the staff.
sentences.chinese: 传统的纸质测评方法对在职人员的测评有失公允。

sentences.english: The traditional paper evaluation system is not fair to the staff.
sentences.chinese: 传统的纸质测评方法对在职人员的测评有失公允。

sentences.english: Evaluation and analysis are carried out in a machine factory by this method.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上对某机床厂进行了试测评与分析。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of democratic appraisement in the probation period of the contracted nurses in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨民主测评法在聘用护士试用期中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Utility analysis is an important approach in checking the result of democratic appraisals of leading cadrse.
sentences.chinese: 效度分析是检验民主测评结果的重要方法。

sentences.english: Personnel assessment serves as the important means of "knowing the people".
sentences.chinese: 人才测评就是“知人”的重要手段。

sentences.english: Finally, the so-called 5-person scoring committee asked all of us.
sentences.chinese: 最后，所谓5人测评小组就征求全班意见。

definition: to take measurements/measured (speed etc)/observed (as opposed to "estimated")/observational (astronomy)
to try sth out/to be on probation
to grade/to mark (student's work)/grade/score (of student's work)
popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
(Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb
